title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama to chat with local models from Python scripts.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; npm install ollama to integrate local LLMs into Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration letting any chain call Ollama models via the Ollama LLM wrapper.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple API to chat, generate and embed with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama with extra helpers for model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as Generators or Embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation keeping Ollama and its CUDA builds reproducible; part of nixpkgs.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples for Ollama server.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama; showcases streaming, history and model switching.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour for reactive chats; Hex package.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes using Ollama for summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-r
summary: R package wrapping Ollama API for R users; install via remotes::install_github().
